name: search_forsale
description: Search for sale listings by address, neighbourhood, city or ZIP

location.description: Search by address, neighborhood, city or ZIP code
location.title: Location

sort.description: Available types: relevant: Sorts listings by their relevance. Default newest_listing: Sorts listings by the listing date in descending order. highest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in descending order. lowest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in ascending order. open_house_date: Sorts listings by the open house date in ascending order. recently_reduced: Sorts listings by the date when the price was last reduced in descending order. largest_sqft: Sorts listings by the square footage in descending order. lot_size: Sorts listings by the lot size in descending order. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., relevant,newest_listing)
sort.title: Sort

type.description: If empty, all available types will be included. Available types: single_family: Refers to standalone residential properties designed to house a single family. condos: Refers to condominium units. townhomes: Refers specifically to townhouses. duplex_triplex: Refers to properties that have two (duplex) or three (triplex) separate living units. multi_family: Refers to properties designed to house multiple families, such as apartment buildings or complexes. mobile: Refers to mobile homes or manufactured homes. farm: Refers to agricultural properties, including farms. land: Refers to undeveloped land or plots available for sale. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., single_family,condo).
type.title: Type

search_radius.description: Change search radius (not in miles, it's categorized) **default ** 0
search_radius.title: Search Radius

foreclosure.description: The foreclosure parameter controls the visibility of foreclosure listings: false: Hides listings that are foreclosures. true: Shows only listings that are foreclosures. If the parameter is not included, both foreclosure and non-foreclosure listings will be shown.
foreclosure.title: Foreclosure

pending.description: The pending_contingent parameter controls the visibility of listings with pending contingencies: false: Hides listings that have pending contingencies. true: Shows only listings with pending contingencies. If the parameter is not included, both listings with and without pending contingencies will be shown.
pending.title: Pending

tags.description: basement, fireplace, central_air, central_heat, forced_air, den_or_office, spa_or_hot_tub, dining_room, swimming_pool, disability_features, family_room, laundry_room, hardwood_floors, rv_or_boat_parking, tennis_court, game_room, horse_facilities, lease_option, energy_efficient_home, garage_1_or_more, garage_2_or_more, garage_3_or_more, carport, single_story, two_or_more_stories, recreation_facilities, community_swimming_pool, community_clubhouse, community_tennis_court, community_golf, community_spa_or_hot_tub, community_security_features, community_boat_facilities, community_horse_facilities, community_park, senior_community, corner_lot, waterfront, cul_de_sac, water_view, view, hill_or_mountain_view, lake_view, river_view, golf_course_view, city_view, ocean_view, golf_course_lot_or_frontage, washer_dryer, community_doorman, pets_allowed, elevator, community_elevator, community_outdoor_space, furniture, furnished, dishwasher, community_no_fee, community_gym, recreation_facility For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., community_gym,recreation_facility)
tags.title: Tags

name: forsale_coordinates
description: Search for sale listings by circle (using latitude, longitude, and radius) or polygon (using a set of coordinates to define a specific area).

latitude.description: The latitude of the center point. Default: 29.270521
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude of the center point. Default: -95.74991
longitude.title: Longitude

radius.description: The radius of the search area in kilometers. Default: 30
radius.title: Radius

sort.description: Available types: relevant: Sorts listings by their relevance. Default newest_listing: Sorts listings by the listing date in descending order. highest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in descending order. lowest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in ascending order. open_house_date: Sorts listings by the open house date in ascending order. recently_reduced: Sorts listings by the date when the price was last reduced in descending order. largest_sqft: Sorts listings by the square footage in descending order. lot_size: Sorts listings by the lot size in descending order. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., relevant,newest_listing)
sort.title: Sort

Available types: single_family: Refers to standalone residential properties designed to house a single family. condos: Refers to condominium units. townhomes: Refers specifically to townhouses. duplex_triplex: Refers to properties that have two (duplex) or three (triplex) separate living units. multi_family: Refers to properties designed to house multiple families, such as apartment buildings or complexes. mobile: Refers to mobile homes or manufactured homes. farm: Refers to agricultural properties, including farms. land: Refers to undeveloped land or plots available for sale. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., single_family,condo).
type.title: Type

foreclosure.title: Foreclosure

pending.description: The pending_contingent parameter controls the visibility of listings with pending contingencies: false: Hides listings that have pending contingencies. true: Shows only listings with pending contingencies. pending.title: Pending

name: search_forrent
description: Search for rent listings by address, neighbourhood, city or ZIP

sort.description: Available types: relevant: Sorts listings by their relevance. Default recently_added: Sorts listings by the listing date in descending order. highest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in descending order. lowest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in ascending order. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., relevant,newest_listing)
sort.title: Sort

type.description: If empty, all available types will be included. Available types: single_family: Refers to standalone residential properties designed to house a single family. condos: Refers to condominium units. apartment: Refers to apartment units. townhomes: Refers specifically to townhouses. duplex_triplex: Refers to properties that have two (duplex) or three (triplex) separate living units. multi_family: Refers to properties designed to house multiple families, such as apartment buildings or complexes. other: Refers to other type of properties available for rent. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., single_family,condos).

search_radius.description: Change search radius (not in miles, it's categorized) **default ** 0

availability_date_max.description: Shows listings available by this date

name: search_forsold
description: Search for sold listings by address, neighbourhood, city or ZIP

sort.description: Enum Available types: sold_date: Sorts listings by their sold date in descending order. Default highest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in descending order. lowest_price: Sorts listings by the list price in ascending order. largest_sqft: Sorts listings by the square footage in descending order. lot_size: Sorts listings by the lot size in descending order. photo_count : Sorts listings by there phot count in descending order.
sort.title: Sort

type.description: If empty, all available types will be included. Available types: single_family: Refers to standalone residential properties designed to house a single family. condos: Refers to condominium units. townhomes: Refers specifically to townhouses. duplex_triplex: Refers to properties that have two (duplex) or three (triplex) separate living units. multi_family: Refers to properties designed to house multiple families, such as apartment buildings or complexes. mobile: Refers to mobile homes or manufactured homes. farm: Refers to agricultural properties, including farms. land: Refers to undeveloped land or plots available for sale. For multiple selections, use comma-separated values (e.g., single_family,condo).
type.title: Type

sold_date_min.description: The **sold_date_min **parameter allows you to filter listings based on their minimum sold date. This parameter is used to include only those listings that were sold on or after the specified date. If the parameter is not included, there will be no restriction on the minimum sold date, and all sold listings will be shown.
sold_date_min.title: Sold Date Min

search_radius.description: Change search radius (not in miles, it's categorized) **default ** 0
search_radius.title: Search Radius

foreclosure.description: The foreclosure parameter controls the visibility of foreclosure listings: false: Hides listings that are foreclosures. true: Shows only listings that are foreclosures. If the parameter is not included, both foreclosure and non-foreclosure listings will be shown.
foreclosure.title: Foreclosure

name: property_details
description: Get a property's details by `property_id` or `url`

name: property_photos
description: Get a property's photos by `property_id` or `url`

name: property_estimates
description: Get historical and forecasted value estimates for a property using the `property_id` or `url`.

historical_years_min.description: The start date for historical value estimates, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Specifies the earliest date for historical data.
historical_years_min.title: Historical Years Min

historical_years_max.description: The end date for historical value estimates, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Specifies the latest date for historical data.
historical_years_max.title: Historical Years Max

forecasted_months_max.description: The end date for forecasted value estimates, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Specifies the maximum date for forecasted data.
forecasted_months_max.title: Forecasted Months Max

name: property_amenities_score
description: Get nearby amenities and location scores for a property using the `property_id` or `url`

name: property_similar_homes
description: Get similar homes for a property by using the `property_id`.

name: property_new_construction_similar_homes
description: Get new construction similar homes for a property using the `property_id` or `url`.

name: property_history
description: Get property history and tax history data for a property using the `property_id` or `url`

name: property_environment_risk
description: Get a property's environmental risks by `property_id` or `url`. (flood, wildfire, etc)

name: property_schools
description: Get a property's nearby schools using the `property_id` or `url`

name: property_market_trends
description: Get a property's market trends using the `property_id` or `url`

name: agent_search
description: Search for agents/teams/offices by `location` (city or ZIP code) or `name`.

name.description: The name of the agent to search for
name.title: Name

limit.description: The number of results to return. Default is '20'. Max is '50'
limit.title: Limit

sort.description: **Possible values: ** recent_activity_high: Sorts by the most recent activity. Default agent_rating_high: Sorts by the highest agent rating. recommendations_count_high: Sorts by the highest number of recommendations. for_sale_count_high: Sorts by the highest number of properties for sale. recently_sold_high: Sorts by the most properties recently sold.
sort.title: Sort

types.description: Specifies the type of result, default is agent Possible values: - agent - team - office
types.title: Types

far_opt_out.description: Set to false to include agents who have opted out of FAR (Federal Acquisition Regulation).
far_opt_out.title: Far Opt Out

recommendations_count_min.description: Minimum number of recommendations the agent should have
recommendations_count_min.title: Recommendations Count Min

agent_rating_min.description: Minimum rating required for agents to be included in the search results
agent_rating_min.title: Agent Rating Min

languages.description: Languages spoken by the agent eg : French
languages.title: Languages

agent_type.description: Specifies the type of agent. Possible values : buyer seller If the param is not included, the results will include both types
agent_type.title: Agent Type

price_min.description: Minimum price of properties handled by the agent
price_min.title: Price Min

price_max.description: Maximum price of properties handled by the agent
price_max.title: Price Max

photo.description: Set to true to exclude agents without a photo
photo.title: Photo

name: agent_profile
description: Get an agent's profile by `advertiser_id` and/or `nrds_id`

name: agent_reviews
description: Get an agent's reviews by `advertiser_id`

name: agent_listings
description: Get an agent's listings by `advertiser_id`

name: agent_recommendations
description: Get an agent's recommendations by `advertiser_id`

name: suggestion
description: Suggests locations based on keyword

name: housing_market_details
description: Get detailed housing market statistics for a specific location, including median prices, market temperature, and rankings.

slug_id.description: A location's id found in the results of /suggestion endpoint
slug_id.title: Slug Id

name: noise
description: Get noise level information by coordinates (lat, lon)
